[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of BilPassifConsPub311221BPIF but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:LiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale, bpi:CurrentAndDeferredTaxLiabilities, ifrs-full:LiabilitiesDueToCentralBanks, ifrs-full:DepositsFromBanks, bpi:AccrualsAndMiscellaneousLiabilities, ifrs-full:DerivativeFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForHedging, ifrs-full:DebtSecurities, ifrs-full:Provisions, ifrs-full:LeaseLiabilities, ifrs-full:AccumulatedFairValueHedgeAdjustmentOnHedgedItemIncludedInCarryingAmountLiabilities, ifrs-full:SubordinatedLiabilities, ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities, ifrs-full:DepositsFromCustomers, ifrs-full:FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of BilActifConsPub311221BPIF but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:Goodwill, ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome, bpi:CurrentAndDeferredTaxAssets, bpi:InnovationFinancingAid, ifrs-full:FinanceLeaseReceivables, ifrs-full:InvestmentProperty, ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill, ifrs-full:InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale, ifrs-full:CashAndBankBalancesAtCentralBanks, bpi:AccrualsAndMiscellaneousAssets, ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers, ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss, ifrs-full:DerivativeFinancialAssetsHeldForHedging, ifrs-full:AccumulatedFairValueHedgeAdjustmentOnHedgedItemIncludedInCarryingAmountAssets, ifrs-full:Assets, ifrs-full:PropertyPlantAndEquipment, ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToBanks, ifrs-full:DebtInstrumentsHeld All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement TFT 311221 includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPosition of 9,888,400,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 9,139,500,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPosition that should add to 9,888,400,000 are comprised of the following:
+ OpeningAssetsAndLiabilitiesAccountsAndLendingBorrowingToFromCreditInstitutions 1,320,300,000 + OpeningCashInHandCentralBanksAssetsAndLiabilities 7,819,200,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for TFT 311221. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPosition Total Value : 9,888,400,000 Total period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500STN7T9MRUMJ267/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/969500STN7T9MRUMJ267-2021-12-31-fr.zip/969500STN7T9MRUMJ267-2021-12-31-fr/reports/969500STN7T9MRUMJ267-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 467
